mapper.select: SELECT i.ITEM_NAME, t.TRANSACTION_DATE, t.TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, t.TRANSACTION_TYPE FROM TRANSACTION t INNER JOIN ITEM i ON (t.ITEM_NUM = i.ITEM_NUM) WHERE t.USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '01', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M1", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '02', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M2", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '03', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M3", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '04', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M4", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '05', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M5", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '06', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M6", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '07', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M7", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '08', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M8", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '09', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M9", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '10', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M10", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '11', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M11", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '12', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M12" FROM TRANSACTION WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-01-01') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31') AND TRANSACTION_TYPE ='구입'

SELECT SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '01', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M1", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '02', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M2", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '03', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M3", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '04', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M4", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '05', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M5", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '06', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M6", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '07', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M7", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '08', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M8", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '09', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M9", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '10', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M10", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '11', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M11", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM'), '12', TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)) AS "M12" FROM TRANSACTION WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-01-01') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31') AND TRANSACTION_TYPE ='환불'
SELECT SUM(TRANSACTION_AMOUNT) AS "M0" FROM TRANSACTION WHERE TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND TRANSACTION_TYPE = '구입' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM')
SELECT SUM(TRANSACTION_AMOUNT) AS "M0" FROM TRANSACTION WHERE TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND TRANSACTION_TYPE = '환불' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'MM')
